newsitem.title: TUNISIA: Tunis bourse index slightly down in active trade.
newsitem.headline: Tunis bourse index slightly down in active trade.

text.p: The Tunis Stock Exchange index on Wednesday closed down 0.15 percent in active trade boosted by first market and over-the-counter dealing, bourse sources said.
The 31-share index closed at 496.16 against 496.98 points on Tuesday.

Total volume was 2.48 million dinars against 663,468 dinars over the previous session. Turnover on the first market was 1.11 million dinars with 49,441 shares changing hands. Over-the-counter deals totalled 1.32 million dinars.
Coca and beer bottler SFBT fell 0.88 dinar to 91 dinars. Retail stores Monoprix slid 0.5 dinar to 35.7. Detergent firm SPCD was down 0.4 dinar to 36.6. UIB bank eased 0.1 dinar to 12.5 dinars.
Investment fund SPDIT-SICAF gained 0.49 dinar to 18.5 dinars with the exchange of 2,395 shares.
UBCI bank rose 0.5 dinar to 49.02. BTEI bank advanced 0.16 dinar to 22.96. BIAT bank which holds its annual meeting on Wednesday, was up 0.14 dinar to 36.9 dinars.
Most of the first market's trade was in Societe Tunisienne de Banque with 15,573 shares changing hands at the unchanged price of 18.62 dinars. ($1=1.08 dinar)
